# freeipa_group (Resource)

Manages a FreeIPA user group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configure provider
provider "freeipa" {
  host               = "ipa.example.com"
  kerberos_enabled   = true
  kerberos_principal = "terraform/ipa.example.com@EXAMPLE.COM"
  kerberos_realm     = "EXAMPLE.COM"
  keytab_path        = "/etc/krb5.keytab"
}

# Create a basic user group
resource "freeipa_group" "developers" {
  cn          = "developers"
  description = "Development team"
}

# Create a group with specific GID
resource "freeipa_group" "devops" {
  cn          = "devops"
  description = "DevOps team"
  gidnumber   = 10001
}

# Create a non-POSIX group
resource "freeipa_group" "mailing_list" {
  cn          = "engineering-announce"
  description = "Engineering announcements mailing list"
  nonposix    = true
}

# Create an external group for trusted domains
resource "freeipa_group" "external_users" {
  cn          = "external-contractors"
  description = "External contractor accounts"
  external    = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cn` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `external` (Boolean) Allow adding external non-IPA members from trusted domains
- `gidnumber` (Number)
- `nonposix` (Boolean) Create as a non-POSIX group
